subtitle: as long as we are alive having this
dream of life and having through the
various circumstances of our life
including people suffering in our life
we keep on learning
and and if a person is so involved in
their own suffering because it's so
intense and maybe they don't have the
tool to transform it then we can be the
silent background in which that crime
can happen and we it is not necessary to
say that we say something to them maybe
we will maybe not but what is important
is that we can be that living embodied
listening
in which
suffering can be felt and transcended
so it's not a compassion that denies the
importance of suffering is a compassion
of being available for the suffering to
be transcended more and more and more
is really embodied love
